::Dachande/Battera/Magmatron::

    They reached the Mountian base and walked to Vulois. "So," Dachande
said. "When do we get started?"
    Magmatron watched as they entered the base, through Dachande's eyes.
"Yes, when do you get started?" He thought to himself.
